title: Where did the emote go?????

embed.description: License This image is copyrighted to Riot Games Inc. However, Riot Games allows the use of their League of Legends intellectual property as long as certain conditions are met, as stated in their Legal Jibber Jabber policy: "you can use League of Legends IP as the basis for a fan project that you're giving away for free or that's only generating ad revenue [...]" We believe our usage also falls under U.S.

body:
I think I have seen this emote before but not anymore recently. 
    Does anyone know why it is unavailable?  I want to buy it    soooo cute!

replies.body: As far as I'm aware it was only available during the Darius/Garen VS event, though I couldn't find any specific info. The VS page doesn't say they were meant to be limited time, but since they're gone now I guess they were. The old VS emotes became available this time round so it's likely these ones will come back next time there is a VS event :)
ohhhhhh you remind me that this lion really looks like the one that Garen has.  Fair enough.   Thank you so much!
I got this emote from chest and i dont have it on my inventory ! what happening..
